content: 8 Auger Bits 8 Auger Bits designed for fast, smooth drilling in wood in tight spaces ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Metal, wood and other material drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easier access, compact drilling between studs and in tight spaces Heat treated head to drill in wood, even with nails Self-feeding threaded tip for fast and easier drilling into wood 4-6 business days lead time Applications Wood, heavy timber and nail-embedded wood 6 working length ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: 7/16 in hexagonal Base material: Wood Length: 8 in Technical Data | Connection end | 7/16 in hexagonal | Base material | Wood ### ITEMS- 3699046 - 1 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 7/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699050 - 1-1/2 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 7/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699048 - 1-1/4 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 7/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699047 - 1-1/8 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 7/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699049 - 1-3/8 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 7/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699038 - 1/2 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 5/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699041 - 11/16 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 5/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699043 - 13/16 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 5/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699045 - 15/16 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 7/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699042 - 3/4 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 5/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699040 - 5/8 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 5/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699044 - 7/8 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 7/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc - 3699039 - 9/16 Ship Auger Drill Bit 8L 5/16 HEX - Package Size 1 pc
